name: Silver Origami Crane Pendant Necklace
description:
This is a TRUE origami crane, folded from fine silver, not stamped. Because each one is hand folded, there will be slight variations in the details. 

The crane, or "tsuru" is a classic origami design, unchanged for centuries. Its often the first animal many folders learn, and is considered a symbol of good luck and wishes granted. Paper cranes are given to people who are sick to wish them a good recovery, or left at cemetaries or memorials as a wish for peace.

The classic origami crane is folded from a square sheet of paper, using only 19 folds. Now imagine starting with a square sheet of fine silver only 1 1/2 inches across, and you get this tiny work of art.

This crane is carefully folded from .999 fine silver, kiln fired, and highly polished. Its just barely 1 inch wide from wingtip to wingtip, or from nose to tail. Comes with an 18" sterling silver chain.

name: Silver Origami Cat Earrings
description:
The origami kitties have been so popular, I decided to shrink them down to earring size. Each one is carefully folded by hand from sheets of fine silver. Because they are all hand folded, there may be slight variations in the details. A head may be tilted slightly, or ears and noses smaller or larger. 

These little guys are about half the size of the pendants, barely 1/2 inch tall. They are made from .999 fine silver silver, folded into kitty shapes, and given a light antiquing to bring out the detail. The ear wires are also sterling silver.

name: Silver Origami Butterfly Earrings
description:
I've been trying to come up with an origami butterfly pattern for a long time, and finally after many modifications came up with this one. These tiny butterflies dangle from sterling silver rings, and look like they are about to take flight.

These are made .999 fine silver, carefully folded and kiln fired. They are then highly polished and attached to an ear wire.

Each earring is just over 1 inch long, and weighs about 1.5 grams. The ear wire is sterling silver.
